I had an amazing experience with Dr Anjali.

review: The doctor is very humble and polite while she is attending the kids. She makes the kids very comfortable and listens to the problem very carefully. She gives all the time required for diagnosing the problem and he‚Äôs never in a hurry. The good part is she will not recommend an antibiotic if it is not required that point in time.

tags: None
review: Dr. Gulani was attentive and extremely approachable. She has a great way of dealing with small children and our daughter who is usually scared of all doctors was calm and comfortable with Dr. Gulani. She explained everything very well and gave a clear prescription and way forward for us to manage our daughter‚Äôs illness.

review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * ***** **** ********** From childhood till date, whenever I had any health issues she is the one I have always  looked forward to. Professionalism, her work ethics, they way she handles critical cases is so apt that I could not  have asked for more. Thanks a lot Dr Anjana.

tags: None
review:
** ****** ****** ** ** ********* *************  I have been going to her for both kids for about 8-9 years.

What I really like about her is she is very calm in difficult situations too. She is a very good diagnostician,  and doesn't get unnecessary test done.

I still go to her for my 16 year old too

Regards 

Latika

review: We consulated Dr Anjana for both my sons *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** **** **** ******* Always available even at 12 in the night. No non-sense and prescribes very less medicines , especially antibiotics to kids. She is easily approachable *** *** ********* ** *** ****. Thanks Dr!!

review:
Very nice doctor.. Who don't run after consultation fee... She genuinely check the baby thoroughly and then provide necessary  medicine.
She is such a humble person and experienced doctor.. Highly recommended and we are very thankful for your guidance ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We recently came to India & were looking for a pediatrician for our 6 month old daughter. We came to know about Dr. Gulani through online search. We have done both personal & virtual appointments with her and have been extremely satisfied.
Dr. Gulani is friendly with the kids and at the same time, a great guide & educator for first time parents like us. 
We consider ourselves lucky to have met her & would strongly recommend her.
